title: A half-hour history of Europe
itunes:title: A half-hour history of Europe
itunes:subtitle: Author and journalist Simon Jenkins is joined by Professor Kathleen Burk to discuss his forthcoming Short History of Europe, which explores some of the key themes and milestones in the continent’s past
description:
Author and journalist Simon Jenkins is joined by Professor Kathleen Burk to discuss his forthcoming Short History of Europe, which explores some of the key themes and milestones in the continent’s past

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
